body: Don't use this as an opportunity to give veiled insults, what are you truly thankful for?
body_html: Don't use this as an opportunity to give veiled insults, what are you truly thankful for?

guild.description:
"For God so loved the world, that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish, but have eternal life. For God did not send the Son into the world to judge the world, but that the world might be saved through Him. He who believes in Him is not judged; he who does not believe has been judged already, because he has not believed in the name of the only begotten Son of God. This is the judgment, that the Light has come into the world, and men loved the darkness rather than the Light, for their deeds were evil. For everyone who does evil hates the Light, and does not come to the Light for fear that his deeds will be exposed. But he who practices the truth comes to the Light, so that his deeds may be manifested as having been wrought in God."

May all personally encounter the presence and attention of the Lord God. 

Curiosity, questions, discussion, and prayer requests are welcome.

guild.name: Christianity

title: What are you thankful for?

body: 5 years ago I was living in a roach filled studio apartment, 15 bucks a week for food, cigarette addiction. Now I just had some homemade donuts for breakfast, a full fridge, two story townhome, and a backyard where I can workout on fitness pavers. I am thankful for living, giving, and sharing. I am thankful for this moment in life. I am thankful for the moments before it and the moments to come.
body_html: 5 years ago I was living in a roach filled studio apartment, 15 bucks a week for food, cigarette addiction. Now I just had some homemade donuts for breakfast, a full fridge, two story townhome, and a backyard where I can workout on fitness pavers. I am thankful for living, giving, and sharing. I am thankful for this moment in life. I am thankful for the moments before it and the moments to come.

body: salvation, family, home, dog, health, gf, job, friends, trials, scriptures, the spirit, music, second chances.

post.title: What are you thankful for?

body: Children. Salvation. A path back to belief. Nature. Every single day that we get to experience joy, frustration, pain, love. The word and the spirit to guide us when we are blind and self centered.
